title: r/Prorevenge I Destroyed An Entitled Karen's Life, Career, And Reputation!
description:
r/Prorevenge Today's episode one, long, epic story story about an entitled Karen who thinks that she's queen of the world, so she tries to screw over her boss and employer by suing them. The lawsuit works, but she makes one important enemy during the process who is not going to let Karen get away with it. So, a plan is set into motion that utterly ruins Karen's life! If you like this episode, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
